mapper.sql: t.`id`, t.`keyword`, t.`mapping_type`, t.`mapping_value`, t.`theme_code`, t.`weight`, t.`match_count`, t.`status`, t.`create_time`
mapper.select: SELECT FROM decoration_keyword_mapping t WHERE t.`keyword` = #{keyword} AND t.`status` = 1 ORDER BY t.`weight` DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM decoration_keyword_mapping t WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND t.`keyword` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY t.`weight` DESC
SELECT FROM decoration_keyword_mapping t WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND t.`mapping_type` = #{mappingType} ORDER BY t.`weight` DESC
SELECT FROM decoration_keyword_mapping t WHERE t.`status` = 1 ORDER BY t.`weight` DESC
